What is Metacity?

","id":"2v2bjj86","animation":{"type":"fade-up","easing":"ease","duration":"700ms","delay":"100ms"}},{"type":"text","name":"Text","_elType":"ELEMENT","content":"

Metacity as the term describes is a city that is based in the Metaverse. In this Metacity, user can experience a highly immersive roleplay gaming where user can virtually interact with each other inside the Metacity.

In Metacity, we also have Non Player Character (NPCs) that provide users with tasks which the players can complete in exchange of BNBMeta. 

Users can also freely go around and explore the open world as they wish.

It is an action adventure game where users can freely customize their own characters.

Users can also select from a variety of professions such as anti-social characters, cops, doctor, or a corporate employ and much more.

Users can also team up with each other.

Users will be provided tasks according to their professions and on completion will be rewarded.

Airdrops will be hidden into different locations randomly around the metacity may it be in banks, police station or trash cans.

How does BNBMeta work?

","id":"1k9l5mny","style":{"margin":[["top","0px"],["bottom","30px"]],"fontSize":"41px","lineHeight":"","color":"#ffffff","letterSpacing":"0px"},"media":{"mobile":{"style":{"fontSize":"40px","lineHeight":"50px"}}},"animation":{"type":"fade-up","duration":"700ms","delay":"100ms"}},{"type":"text","name":"Text","_elType":"ELEMENT","content":"

BNBMeta works as a default currency inside the Metacity, it will be used for everything like how a currency is used inside the Metacity.

In game whenever user needs to do anything they will require BNBMeta for it.

Users can gain BNBMeta by completing tasks, missions or through airdrops.

Users can also freely trade their BNBMeta with each other inside the Metacity.

","component_path":"text","id":"knz320p7","style":{"color":"rgba(229, 234, 255, 0.7)","fontSize":"16px","lineHeight":"30px","margin":[["top","0px"],["bottom","60px"],["left",""],["right",""]],"padding":[["left",""],["right",""]]},"media":{"mobile":{"style":{"padding":[["left","5px"],["right","5px"]],"lineHeight":"","fontSize":"14px"}}},"animation":{"type":"fade-up","duration":"700ms","delay":"100ms"}},{"type":"iconText","name":"Icon & Text","_elType":"ELEMENT","content":"

So, what happens when a user dies?

","component_path":"iconText","style":{"fontSize":"23px","color":"#ffffff","flexDirection":"","justifyContent":"flex-start"},"icon":{"gap":"15px","size":"35px","color":"#3055D3","icon":{"prefix":"far","iconName":"arrow-alt-circle-right"}},"id":"0m8dmd7f","animation":{"type":"fade-up","duration":"700ms","delay":"100ms"}},{"type":"text","name":"Text","_elType":"ELEMENT","content":"

Users don't need to worry over this fact when their character dies as they can also be revived, but their is a condition to revive the character and that is to spend their BNBMeta to revive their character and a portion of this BNBMeta will be sent to developers as a fee to revive the character.

","component_path":"text","id":"zff8t3gx","style":{"color":"rgba(229, 234, 255, 0.7)","fontSize":"15px","lineHeight":"26px","margin":[["top","5px"],["bottom","0px"],["left","60px"],["right",""]],"textAlign":"left"},"media":{"mobile":{"style":{"fontSize":"13px","margin":[["top",""],["bottom","0px"],["left","1px"],["right",""]]}}},"animation":{"type":"fade-up","duration":"700ms","delay":"100ms"}}],"id":"b7um1x7r","_elType":"COLUMN","type":"column","component_path":"column","attr":{"__class__columnSize":"1/2"},"media":{"tablet":{"attr":{"__class__columnSize":"1/1"},"style":{"padding":[["top","40px"],["bottom","40px"],["left","60px"],["right","60px"]]}},"mobile":{"style":{"margin":[["top","30px"],["bottom",""]],"padding":[["top","40px"],["bottom","40px"],["left","30px"],["right","30px"]]}}}}],"id":"93anbzeb","_elType":"ROW","component_path":"row","style":{"margin":[["top",""]]},"settings":{"columnGap":"40px","reverseColumn":false},"media":{"tablet":{"settings":{"columnGap":"60px"}}}}],"id":"ik5x9qes","type":"section","_elType":"SECTION","component_path":"section","style":{"padding":[["top",""],["bottom",""]],"backgroundColor":"#202020","margin":[["top","0px"],["bottom","0px"],["left",""],["right",""]],"border":[["width","0px"],["style","solid"],["color",""]]},"frames":{"corner":{"frameId":0,"cornerPosition":"top-left","flip":"rotateY(180deg)","height":"500px","width":"500px","color":"#F7FAFF"}}},{"name":"Section","content":[{"name":"Row","type":"row","content":[{"name":"Column","style":{"textAlign":"left","padding":[["left",""]],"justifyContent":"center"},"content":[{"name":"Title","titleType":"h2","type":"heading","_elType":"ELEMENT","component_path":"title","content":"

Future Scope

","id":"4t940z1i","style":{"margin":[["top","0px"],["bottom","30px"]],"fontSize":"48px","lineHeight":"60px","color":"#ffffff"},"media":{"mobile":{"style":{"fontSize":"41px","lineHeight":"50px"}}},"animation":{"type":"fade-up","duration":"700ms","delay":"100ms"}},{"type":"text","name":"Text","_elType":"ELEMENT","content":"

Metaverse has been raging lately in the market and the Metaverse is going to keep increasing exponentially in the future.

Metacity is also going to keep increasing as the metaverse increases and it will become a leading platform in the Metaverse and will become a grossing play-to-earn platform.

And with passing time we will also introduce new Metacities.
